description: Relocation of entrance door in front elevation, Porch canopy,  Installation of bay windows in front elevation, Conversion of garage into habitable room, Replacement window in side elevation,  Single storey rear extension with green roof, Replacement windows in rear elevation with Juliette balconies at first and second floors, Alterations and extension to roof to form end gables and front and rear dormers, Installation of boundary wall and gate to front elevation, External alterations (Demolition of front porch and outbuilding at rear)
decision_conditions: <p style="margin-bottom:0cm; padding:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt"><span style="line-height: normal;">Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (or any order revoking or re-enacting that order with or without modification), no development which would otherwise fall within Classes A to E in Part 1 of Schedule 2 to that Order shall be carried out without the prior written permission of the local planning authority.</span></p>

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
